Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Chardonnay \Char`don*nay"\ (ch[aum]r`d'n*[=a]"), n. 1. a white wine grape. [WordNet 1.5]
2. dry white Chablis-type table wine made from Chardonnay grapes.
Syn: Pinot Chardonnay. [WordNet 1.5]
Chardonnay n 1: white wine grape [syn: {chardonnay grape}] 2: dry white table wine resembling Chablis but made from Chardonnay grapes [syn: {Pinot Chardonnay}]
